<div class="contact-wrapper">
  <h1>Get in Touch</h1>
  <p class="intro">Weâ€™d love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, or ideas, feel free to reach out using the form below.</p>

  <form id="contact-form" class="contact-form">
    <label for="name">Your Name</label>
    <input type="text" name="name" id="name" required>

    <label for="email">Your Email</label>
    <input type="email" name="email" id="email" required>

    <label for="message">Message</label>
    <textarea name="message" id="message" rows="6" required></textarea>

    <button type="submit">Send Message</button>

    <p id="form-status" class="status-message" style="display:none;"></p>
  </form>
</div>

<style>
.contact-wrapper {
  max-width: 700px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 2rem 1.5rem;
  font-family: "Segoe UI", Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
  background-color: #f9f9fb;
  border-radius: 12px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
}

.contact-wrapper h1 {
  color: #005c99;
  font-size: 2rem;
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.intro {
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  color: #555;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.contact-form label {
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #333;
}

.contact-form input[type="text"],
.contact-form input[type="email"],
.contact-form textarea {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-family: inherit;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  transition: border-color 0.2s ease-in-out;
}

.contact-form input:focus,
.contact-form textarea:focus {
  border-color: #007acc;
  outline: none;
}

.contact-form button {
  display: inline-block;
  background-color: #007acc;
  color: white;
  border: none;
  padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.contact-form button:hover {
  background-color: #005c99;
}

.status-message {
  font-size: 1rem;
  margin-top: 1rem;
  color: #007700;
  background: #eaffea;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  border: 1px solid #a5d6a7;
}
</style>

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
  const form = document.getElementById("contact-form");
  const status = document.getElementById("form-status");

  form.addEventListener("submit", async function (e) {
    e.preventDefault(); // prevent default form submission

    const formData = new FormData(form);

    try {
      const response = await fetch("https://formspree.io/f/xvgpkzbe", {
        method: "POST",
        headers: { Accept: "application/json" },
        body: formData
      });

      if (response.ok) {
        status.textContent = "Thanks for your message! We'll get back to you soon.";
        status.style.display = "block";
        status.style.color = "#007700";
        form.reset();
      } else {
        const data = await response.json();
        if (data.errors) {
          status.textContent = data.errors.map(error => error.message).join(", ");
        } else {
          status.textContent = "Oops! There was a problem submitting your form.";
        }
        status.style.display = "block";
        status.style.color = "#cc0000";
      }
    } catch (error) {
      status.textContent = "Network error. Please try again later.";
      status.style.display = "block";
      status.style.color = "#cc0000";
    }
  });
});
</script>
